description: Tributes are paid to the Douglas South MHK, who died on Thursday after a long illness.
title: Bill Malarkey: Tributes paid to Isle of Man home affairs minister
title_page: Bill Malarkey: Tributes paid to Isle of Man home affairs minister - BBC News
maintext: "Bill's loss is untimely and he had still so much to give, but we can take some comfort that his suffering is over," Mr Quayle said.
